reviewtext: The radio is made of great quality, but like others have wrote the range when it's in carry mode is very bad. So if your thinking about using this as a bug out item don't. To use this for a bug out scenario wouldn't work unless the person you're talking to is standing right next to you. In car mode with a antenna it's cool as heck.  It has all the bells and whistles in place back light, weather, rechargeable battery pack with power cord,  and more....Good job Midland
